mapper.sql: ID, SN, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, MATERIAL_CODE, MATERIAL_NAME, VT_SN, STATEMENT_TYPE, WORK_ORDER, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DATE, DELETED_FLAG
mapper.insert:
insert into am_statement_sn(SN, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, MATERIAL_CODE, MATERIAL_NAME, VT_SN, STATEMENT_TYPE, WORK_ORDER, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DATE, DELETED_FLAG) values
( #{item.sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.materialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vtSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.statementType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.workOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.deletedFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
on duplicate key update SN=values(SN), PRODUCT_CODE = values(PRODUCT_CODE), PRODUCT_NAME = values(PRODUCT_NAME), MATERIAL_CODE = values(MATERIAL_CODE), MATERIAL_NAME = values(MATERIAL_NAME), VT_SN = values(VT_SN), STATEMENT_TYPE = values(STATEMENT_TYPE), WORK_ORDER = values(WORK_ORDER), CREATED_BY = values(CREATED_BY), CREATED_DATE = values(CREATED_DATE), UPDATED_BY = values(UPDATED_BY), UPDATED_DATE = values(UPDATED_DATE), DELETED_FLAG = values(DELETED_FLAG)
